Alternatively, if you're in the mood for a superhero movie with a unique twist, "Super" (2010) directed by James Gunn is an entertaining and quirky film that follows a young man who decides to become a superhero after being inspired by a movie. Based on the user's preferences, I recommend the movie "Pandemonium" (2012) starring Adam Brooks. The film follows a former high school student who decides to reopen the cheerleading program at her old high school after years of closure due to a serial killer. It's a thrilling and emotional ride that explores themes of resilience, determination, and the power of community.

Alternatively, I also recommend "Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time" (2010) starring Jake Gyllenhaal. This action-packed movie follows a young fugitive prince and princess as they race against time to stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that reverses time. With stunning visuals and an engaging storyline, this film is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.
